title: The Complicated Diary of a Stepbrother - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Black Belly   Male Protagonist   Older Love Interests   R-18   Sister Complex
author: Ooedo Umeko   大江戸ウメコ
description:
My parent had remarried, and I got a new older sister.

My older sister who I thought as annoying had become my family, and then, before I knew it, my feelings for my older sister changed into love.

*This is the stepbrother’s POV for the series Lean Tuna and Her Stepbrother's Plan to Become a Fatty Tuna.>
